00003 using namespace std;
00004 using boost::any;
00005 using boost::mt19937;

00007 const char *NGENE_VERSION = "0.2007.10.17";

00009 int main()
00010 {
00011         printf("Starting Ngene v%s\n\nPreparing the environment:\n", NGENE_VERSION);
00012 
00013         SettingsManager settings_manager;
00014         if (!settings_manager.is_loaded())
00015         {
00016                 printf("  * Could not read from 'ngene.conf'.\n\nAborting...\n");
00017                 return -1;
00018         }
00019 
00020         PluginManager module (settings_manager);
00021 
00022         Logger logger;
00023         logger.log(module.modules);
00024 
00025         boost::mt19937 rand_gen ((unsigned)time(NULL));
00026         //boost::uniform_01<boost::mt19937> rand_dist (rand_gen);
00027         //boost::variate_generator<boost::mt19937 &, boost::uniform_01<boost::mt19937> > mt_rand (rand_gen, rand_dist);
00028         boost::uniform_real<double> rand_dist (0, 1);
00029         boost::variate_generator<boost::mt19937 &, boost::uniform_real<double> > mt_rand (rand_gen, rand_dist);
00030 
00031         // Prepare the initial population
00032         double population_fitness = 0;
00033         multiset<Specimen> adults;
00034         for (int i = 0; i < settings_manager.config.adult_pool_capacity; i++)
00035         {
00036                 Specimen specimen;
00037                 specimen.age = 1;
00038                 module.seed(specimen.genotype);
00039                 module.fitness_assess(specimen);
00040                 population_fitness += specimen.fitness;
00041                 adults.insert(specimen);
00042         }
00043 
00044         vector<multiset<Specimen>::iterator> mates (settings_manager.config.adult_pool_capacity);
00045         multiset<Specimen> offspring;
00046         multiset<Specimen>::iterator iter_tmp;
00047 
00048         printf("Evolution started: %i generations shall live and prosper!\n\n", settings_manager.config.doomsday);
00049 
00050         logger.log(0, adults.rbegin()->fitness, population_fitness / adults.size(), adults.begin()->fitness);
00051         double ticks = clock();
00052 
00053         // Commence evolution
00054         for (int generation = 1; generation < settings_manager.config.doomsday; generation++)
00055         {
00056                 // Mating season!
00057                 offspring.clear();
00058                 if ((int)mates.size() < 2)
00059                 {
00060                         iter_tmp = --adults.end();
00061                         mates.push_back(iter_tmp);
00062                         mates.push_back(iter_tmp);
00063                 }
00064                 // The following loop has multithreading potential. Exploit!
00065                 while ((int)offspring.size() < settings_manager.config.offspring_rate)
00066                 {
00067                         do
00068                         {
00069                                 module.select(mates[0], adults, generation);
00070                                 module.select(mates[1], adults, generation);
00071                         } while (mates[0] == mates[1]);
00072                         if (mt_rand() <= settings_manager.config.mating_rate)
00073                         {
00074                                 vector<Specimen> embryo (module.offspring_rate);
00075                                 module.mate(embryo, *mates[0], *mates[1]);
00076                                 for(vector<Specimen>::iterator fetus = embryo.begin(); fetus != embryo.end(); fetus++)
00077                                 {
00078                                         if (mt_rand() <= settings_manager.config.mutation_rate)
00079                                                 module.mutate(fetus->genotype);
00080                                         module.fitness_assess(*fetus);
00081                                         offspring.insert(*fetus);
00082                                 }
00083                         }
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 // Replace the adults with offspring
00087                 if (settings_manager.config.lifespan == 0)
00088                 {
00089                         if (settings_manager.config.elitism)
00090                         {
00091                                 Specimen specimen = *adults.begin();
00092                                 adults = offspring;
00093                                 adults.insert(specimen);
00094                         }
00095                         else
00096                                 adults = offspring;
00097                 }
00098                 else    // Age the adult pool and replace offspring with old adults
00099                 {
00100                         mates.clear();
00101                         for (multiset<Specimen>::iterator i = --adults.end(); i != adults.begin(); i--)
00102                         {
00103                                 if(i->age == settings_manager.config.lifespan)
00104                                         mates.push_back(i);
00105                                 else
00106                                         i->age++;
00107                         }
00108                         if (!settings_manager.config.elitism)
00109                         {
00110                                 iter_tmp = adults.begin();
00111                                 if(iter_tmp->age == settings_manager.config.lifespan)
00112                                         adults.erase(iter_tmp);
00113                                 else
00114                                         iter_tmp->age++;
00115                         }
00116                         if ((int)mates.size() > 0)
00117                         {
00118                                 for (vector<multiset<Specimen>::iterator>::iterator i = mates.begin(); i != mates.end(); i++)
00119                                         adults.erase(*i);
00120                                 for (int i = (int)adults.size(); i != settings_manager.config.adult_pool_capacity; i++)
00121                                 {
00122                                         module.select(iter_tmp, offspring, generation);
00123                                         adults.insert(*iter_tmp);
00124                                         offspring.erase(iter_tmp);
00125                                 }
00126                         }
00127 
00128                         // Replace lower citizens with prodigies
00129                         for (int i = 0; i < (int)(mt_rand() * settings_manager.config.max_prodigies); i++)
00130                         {
00131                                 adults.erase(--adults.end());
00132                                 module.select(iter_tmp, offspring, generation);
00133                                 adults.insert(*iter_tmp);
00134                                 offspring.erase(iter_tmp);
00135                         }
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 // Gather statistics
00139                 population_fitness = 0;
00140                 for (multiset<Specimen>::iterator i = adults.begin(); i != adults.end(); i++)
00141                         population_fitness += i->fitness;
00142                 logger.log(generation, adults.rbegin()->fitness, population_fitness / adults.size(), adults.begin()->fitness);
00143         }
00144         ticks = clock() - ticks;
00145 
00146         logger.log(adults, module.genotype_to_str);
00147 
00148         mates.clear();
00149         adults.clear();
00150         offspring.clear();
00151 
00152         logger.log(ticks);
00153         return 0;
00154 }
